00025 // HTDIG base config config
00026 $htdigSearch = 'http://'.$_SERVER['SERVER_ADDR'].'/htdig/search.html';
00027 $htdigBin = 'http://'.$_SERVER['SERVER_ADDR'].'/cgi-bin/htsearch';
00028 
00029 /* HTDIG Options */
00030 $method = isset($_GET['method'])?$_GET['method']:'';
00031 $format = isset($_GET['format'])?$_GET['format']:'';
00032 $sort = isset($_GET['sort'])?$_GET['sort']:'';
00033 $config = isset($_GET['config'])?$_GET['config']:'';
00034 $restrict = isset($_GET['restrict'])?$_GET['restrict']:'';
00035 $exclude = isset($_GET['exclude'])?$_GET['exclude']:'';
00036 $p = isset($_GET['p'])?$_GET['p']:'';
00037 $page = isset($_GET['page'])?$_GET['page']:'1';
00038 $words = isset($_GET['words'])?trim($_GET['words']):'';
00039 
00040 // create file URL handle
00041 if ($words) {
00042     $handle = @fopen($htdigSearch, 'r');
00043     if (!$handle) {
00044         echo '<div style="margin: 3px; padding: 5px; border: 1px dotted #FF0000; color: #FF0000;">Can\'t Open HTDIG Search.'
00045             .'Please make sure that HTDIG installed correctly.</div>';
00046     }
00047 } else {
00048     // htdig cgi binary search URL
00049     $url = $htdigBin.'?config='.$config.'&restrict='.$restrict.'&exclude='.$exclude.'&method='.$method.'&format='.$format.'&sort='.$sort.'&words='.$words.'&page='.$page;
00050     $handle = @fopen($url, 'r');
00051     if (!$handle) {
00052         echo '<div style="margin: 3px; padding: 5px; border: 1px dotted #FF0000; color: #FF0000;">Can\'t Open HTDIG for search.'
00053             .'Please make sure that HTDIG installed correctly.</div>';
00054     }
00055 }
00056 
00057 // output
00058 if ($handle) {
00059     while (!feof($handle)) {
00060         $buffer = fgets($handle, 4096);
00061         if (preg_match('/PAGING_SEARCH_RESULT/i', $buffer)) {
00062             $buffer = preg_replace('/cgi-bin/i', str_replace('/', '', SENAYAN_WEB_ROOT_DIR), $buffer);
00063             $buffer = preg_replace('/htsearch/', 'index.php', $buffer);
00064             $buffer = preg_replace('/\?/', '', $buffer);
00065             $buffer = preg_replace('/index.php/', 'index.php?p=htdig&', $buffer);
00066             $buffer = preg_replace('/;/', '&', $buffer);
00067         }
00068         echo $buffer;
00069     }
00070     fclose($handle);
00071 }
00072 ?>
